Text:
Another fabulous compilation of extremely rare gems.
The song I liked the most is Mark Holden - Who'd Be Fool Enough. Could you, 80z please give us some information about him. Is this Australian Mark Holden? I Think not.
Cheers
rtrifunov no I don't think so. I gotta check the info on the lp when I get a chance. cheers

Thankyou again 80zforever, what you are doing is almost magical, it would be impossible to find these long lost records if it wasnt for your dedication and selfless work
you truly make the internet a very special place, i just hope the pirate bay stays around long enough for me to download all of your music!!
many many thanks 80zforever!!

Hello, 80zforever !!!
You're awesome BTW !!
I need some help though, I made a torrent with some unknown songs ... at least i can't remember or identify them. I hope you can help me out ... thx
